definition: to transfer to another club (professional sports)
to revolve/to turn/to circle about/to walk about/classifier for revolutions (per minute etc): revs, rpm/classifier for repeated actions
to turn/to change direction/to transfer/to forward (mail)
can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])

sentences.english: Krisztian Nemeth today completed a loan switch to Championship side Blackpool.
sentences.chinese: 內梅斯今天完成了租借至英冠球隊布萊克浦的轉會。

sentences.english: Juventus chief Alessio Secco has opened the door to the sale of David Trezeguet.
sentences.chinese: 尤文體育部經理塞科爲特雷澤蓋的轉會打開方便之門。

sentences.english: Inter Milan midfielder Wesley Sneijder admitted that he was "close" to joining Manchester United this summer.
sentences.chinese: 國米中場斯內德承認自己今夏很接近轉會曼聯。

sentences.english: Football clubs have been busy in the close season transfer market.
sentences.chinese: 足球俱樂部在休賽季節的轉會市場上一直忙個不停。

sentences.english: The Frenchman has been transfer listed for more than a season following Diego Cavalieri's move to Liverpool in 2008.
sentences.chinese: 法國人轉會到利物浦比卡瓦雷利要早一個賽季。

sentences.english: Roma striker Shabani Nonda is in line for a move to Galatasaray.
sentences.chinese: 羅馬前鋒農達有意轉會至加拉塔薩雷。

sentences.english: Pacheco's transfer continued a trend of teenagers leaving Barcelona for the Premier League.
sentences.chinese: 帕切科的轉會沿襲了巴塞羅那青少年出走英超的傳統。

sentences.english: Players who appear in the Champions League become cup-tied and command significantly less in the market.
sentences.chinese: 打了冠軍盃的球員們如果轉會就不能參加歐洲賽事了。

sentences.english: Just before the summer window closed they squeezed in a takeover and the record-signing of Robinho.
sentences.chinese: 他們在夏季轉會窗口關閉前與羅比尼奧簽約。

sentences.english: Stoke City break their transfer record to capture Sunderland striker Kenwyne Jones.
sentences.chinese: 斯托克破俱樂部轉會記錄地從桑得蘭簽下了前鋒瓊斯。

sentences.english: It would be a terrific move for Portsmouth FC and a real coup.
sentences.chinese: 而這也會哐噹一聲，成爲朴茨茅斯的一次恐怖轉會。

sentences.english: Parma are in negotiations with Juventus for defender Jean Alain Boumsong.
sentences.chinese: 帕爾馬正和尤文圖斯就布姆松轉會一案進行談判。

sentences.english: Italiani believes Zapata would be open to a move to the Premier League this summer.
sentences.chinese: 伊塔里尼相信薩帕塔會對夏天轉會去到英超很感興趣。

sentences.english: Khalid Boulahrouz receives his first call-up for Holland as a Chelsea player.
sentences.chinese: 布拉魯茲在轉會到切爾西以後第一次入選了國家隊。

sentences.english: "The European Championship derails transfer activity, " said Sir Alex.
sentences.chinese: “歐洲盃讓轉會市場冷清下來，”弗格森爵士說。

sentences.english: The Morocco striker Marouane Chamakh, though, looks set to finally arrive on a free transfer from Bordeaux.
sentences.chinese: 而摩洛哥前鋒查馬克也即將從波爾多自由轉會而來。

definition: to renew or extend a contract
to expire/to run out/to come to an end
to return to one's unit/to go back to one's station in life
Roth (name)/Kenneth Roth (1955-), executive director of Human Rights Watch 人權觀察|人权观察[Ren2 quan2 Guan1 cha2]
